content:
> Hey, I'm not up-to-date on the current status of witnesses w.r.t. development (is this tracked somewhere?). My current use case is somewhere between a full node (expensive) and a light node (extra latency for state RPC queries) which seems to fit the witness mechanisms perfectly.
> 
> Is it possible to use the witness mechanisms today in a private mainnet network (all nodes on mainnet, normal full nodes at the edge to generate witnesses and propagate to inner nodes)?
<@!283445391721234432> Our witnesses are not production ready, and they are fundamentally a different thing, the thing we are working on first is more like a state object snapshot. What are you trying to do exactly?
